title: That was fast!
content:
So long Comic Sans...

And thanks from a book designer for featuring a more "functional" font. I'm always interested in new fonts that have the versatility I need for text.
author: pattyfab

comments.content:
I Lived Through Comic Sans Weekend

and all I got was the memory
To bad flash doesn't support it's sweet ligatures.
To clear up a conversation I'm having with Patty, wasn't this designed by Stefan (Hattenbach)?
Absolutely gorgeous! Santa just got an addendum to my holiday wish list. ;-)
Yes, this typeface was designed by Stefan, available exclusively through Veer.
I like it when I recognize type designer's fingerprints. Makes me feel young again. Thanks.
Good jokes depend largely on timing. Comic Sans wouldn't have stayed comical for long. =}
Although I'm still seeing Comic Sans on the background of the main menu?
Clear your browser cache, or wait a while. One will bring in the new font right away, the other eventually.
The odd part is that I did that, but it seems to be working now.
metalfoot, for your sake I hope that Comic Sans hasn't somehow become hardwired to your computer. ;-)
